 [ch]D[/ch]

[ch]C[/ch]                                            [ch]G[/ch]
Rudolph The Red-Nosed Reineer, had a very shiny nose
                                               [ch]C[/ch]   
And if you ever saw him, you might even say it glows
 [ch]C[/ch]                                                         [ch]G[/ch]
And all of the other reindeer, used to laugh and call him names
 [ch]G[/ch]                                                [ch]C[/ch]
They never let poor Rudolph join in any reindeer games
 [ch]F[/ch]                 [ch]C[/ch]               [ch]Dm[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]       
And then one foggy Christmas Eve, Santa he came to say,
 [ch]G[/ch]                               [ch]D[/ch] or [ch]D7[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]      
"Rudolph with your nose so red, won't you guide my sleigh tonight?"

[ch]G[/ch]                                                  [ch]C[/ch]
"Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer, you'll go down in history"
[ch]C[/ch]                                                                     [ch]G[/ch]

 [ch]G[/ch]                                                                 [ch]C[/ch]

 [ch]C[/ch]                                                    [ch]G[/ch]                   
And all of the other reineer, man, they sure did feel ashamed.
 [ch]G[/ch]                                                           [ch]C[/ch]
"Rudolph, you know we're sorry, we're truly gonna try to change."

content.text:
Hi there! Everybody loves a good Christmas song like Rudolph, but there
isn't a single chord version on here that sounds right, so I did my own!

                            Have fun & Rate!!

Follow me on instagram, I'm llguitar - http://instagram.com/llguitar
or come visit at liveloveguitar.com  :)


Standard tuning
No capo needed, but 
I like a capo on 1



[ch]G[/ch]
Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer,
                 [ch]D[/ch]
Had a very shiny nose,
([ch]D[/ch])
And if you ever saw it,
                      [ch]G[/ch]
You would even say it glows.
([ch]G[/ch])
All of the other reindeer
                           [ch]D[/ch]
Used to laugh and call him names,
([ch]D[/ch])                            
They never let poor Rudolph,
                     [ch]G[/ch]
Join in any reindeer games.
[ch]C[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]D7[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]
Then one foggy Christmas Eve, Santa came to say,
[ch]D[/ch]                  [ch]Bm[/ch]              [ch]Em[/ch]        [ch]A7[/ch]       [ch]D7[/ch]
"Rudolph with your nose so bright, won't you guide my sleigh tonight?"
[ch]G[/ch]
Then how the reindeer loved him,
([ch]G[/ch])                      [ch]D[/ch]
As they shouted out with glee,
([ch]D[/ch])
"Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer,
[ch]D7[/ch]                [ch]A7[/ch] [ch]D7[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]
You'll go down in history." 



Have fun!  Happy Holidays!

"Everybody Wants To Rule The World" - Tears For Fears

(Standard Tuning / No Capo)

This is based off georgiarose16's cover on youtube. Any comments or corrections are welcome.

[Intro]

There's no turning back

content.text:
[Intro] 
[ch]C[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]


[Verse 1]

[ch]C[/ch]
Call you up in the middle of the night
[ch]Em/B[/ch]
Like a firefly without a light
[ch]Am[/ch]
You were there like a blowtorch burnin'
[ch]G[/ch]
I was a key that could use a little turnin'
[ch]C[/ch]
So tired that I couldn't even sleep
[ch]Em[/ch]
So many secrets I couldn't keep
[ch]Am[/ch]
Promised myself I wouldn't weep
[ch]G[/ch]
One more promise I couldn't keep

[ch]F[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]
It seems no one can help me now
     [ch]C[/ch]                  [ch]Am[/ch]
I'm in too deep there's no way out
[ch]F[/ch]                [ch]Em[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]
This time I have really led myself astray


[Chorus]

[ch]C[/ch]
Runaway train never going back
[ch]Em[/ch]
Wrong way on a one way track
[ch]Am[/ch]
Seems like I should be getting somewhere
[ch]G[/ch]
Somehow I'm neither here nor there


[Verse 2]

[ch]C[/ch]
Can you help me remember how to smile
[ch]Em[/ch]
Make it somehow all seem worthwile
[ch]Am[/ch]
How on earth did I get so jaded
[ch]G[/ch]
Life's mysteries seem so faded
[ch]C[/ch]
I can go where no one else can go
[ch]Em[/ch]
I know what no one else knows
[ch]Am[/ch]
Here I am just drowning in the rain
[ch]G[/ch]
With a ticket for a runaway train

[ch]F[/ch]                    [ch]G[/ch]
And everything seems cut and dry
[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]Am[/ch]
Day and night, Earth and sky
[ch]F[/ch]         [ch]Em[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]
Somehow I just don't believe it


[Chorus]

[ch]C[/ch]
Runaway train never going back
[ch]Em[/ch]
Wrong way on a one way track
